mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION_LIST ( RESTAURANT_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVE_DAY, RESERVE_TIME, NUMBER_OF_GUESTS ) VALUES ( #{restaurantNo}, #{memberNo}, #{reserveDay}, #{reserveTime}, #{numberOfGuests} )
mapper.select: SELECT RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo, INTERVAL interval, MAX_NUM maxNum, MIN_NUM minNum, DESCRIPTION description FROM TB_RESERVATION_SETTING WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}

SELECT B.BREAK_START_TIME breakStartTime, B.BREAK_END_TIME breakEndTime, AT.RESERVATION_START_TIME reservationStartTime, AT.RESERVATION_END_TIME reservationEndTime, RS.INTERVAL interval FROM TB_BREAKTIME B RIGHT JOIN TB_OPERATING_HOURS OH ON (OH.OPERATING_HOURS_NO = B.OPERATING_HOURS_NO) JOIN TB_AVAILABLE_TIME AT ON (AT.OPERATING_HOURS_NO = OH.OPERATING_HOURS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION_SETTING RS ON (RS.RESTAURANT_NO = OH.RESTAURANT_NO) WHERE OH.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND OH.WEEKDAY = #{weekDay}

SELECT RL.RESERVE_TIME reserveTime, COUNT(*) count FROM TB_RESERVATION_LIST RL JOIN TB_RESERVATION_SETTING RS ON (RS.RESTAURANT_NO = RL.RESTAURANT_NO) WHERE RL.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND RL.RESERVE_DAY = #{reserveDay} AND RL.RESERVE_TIME = #{reserveTime} GROUP BY RL.RESERVE_TIME,RS.MAX_TEAM_NUM HAVING COUNT(*) >= RS.MAX_TEAM_NUM

SELECT RESERVATION_NO reservationNo, RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo, MEMBER_NO memberNo, RESERVE_DAY reserveDay, RESERVE_TIME reserveTime, NUMBER_OF_GUESTS numberOfGuests, CREATE_DATE createDate FROM TB_RESERVATION_LIST WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
